Course Description: THIS COURSE WILL INTRODUCE STUDENTS TO THE FIELD OF FRAUD EXAMINATION AND HOW FRAUD OCCURS AND IS DETECTED WITHIN FINANCIAL STATEMENTS. THIS COURSE WILL EXPAND IN AREAS OF REVENUE, INVENTORY, LIABILITIES, ASSETS, AND INADEQUATE DISCLOSURES RELATED TO FINANCIAL STATEMENT INVESTIGATIONS AND FRAUD.
Textbook(s): ALBRECHT, W. S., ALBRECHT, C. C., & ALBRECHT, C. O. (2005).  FRAUD EXAMINATION (2ND ED.).  SOUTH-WESTERN COLLEGE.  ISBN:  032430160X.
Transfer Status: GUARANTEED TRANSFER TO INSTITUTION OFFERING SAME COURSE.
